comment.author: 96752972@N00
comment._content:
A quick check of the 1930 and 1933 NSW electoral Rolls shows Inez Louisa Marden and Walter Laurence Marden living at "Fromelles", 38 Anzac Parade, Matraville in 1930. So it is "Iney", diminutive of "Inez".

In other years, she comes up as "Eney" as well as  "Iney" in the '40s and '50s and even "Incy" in 1963 (when she and Walter are are at 1115 Anzac Parade, Matraville).

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Thanks Geoff - we didn't know Inez's name and I will amend the Catalog RW
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 96752972@N00
comment._content: No worries. I tried Trove newspapers first, but she was only ever Mrs I L Marden there. Electoral rolls are always a good place to check names despite the fact that the names can sometimes be mangled in the printing of the rolls.
